PARTICIPANT TRAINING MANUAL
Maternal mortality is a public health problem in the Low- and Middle-Income Countries (LMIC) such as Nigeria and it is one of the strongest indicators of a country’s
standard of living and maternity care. Every year, an estimated 14 million cases of PPH and 70,000 related maternal deaths are recorded globally. This implies that one
woman dies of PPH every four minutes.
